name: U.S. Art Supply 70" High Boardroom XL Black Aluminum Flip Chart Easel & Presentation Stand - Adjustable Floor/Tabletop, Portable Tripod, Holds 45 lbs, for Chart Paper, Poster Boards, & Pads
short_description: Boardroom model XL heavy duty 70" high large black aluminum flip chart stand and presentation easel stand with an adjustable tripod frame that supports up to 45 pounds. Includes a 28" wide flip-chart bar for securely holding writing pads.

Sets up quickly varying from 36" up to 70" high for use as a floor, tabletop or an artwork flip board pad display easel. The adjustable height display holder arms can be adjusted then locked into position.

Extra heavy construction, premium quality 3/4" diameter reinforced tubular aluminum that makes it tough and sturdy. The non-skid rubber feet add stability and protect tabletop surfaces. This premium lightweight portable easel collapses down to 36".

A heavy duty display flipchart easel to present information at an optimal height. Used for writing pads, office and classroom presentations, anchor chart stand, trade shows, posters, dry erase boards, event and store signs.
Easel Dimensions: 36" wide by 39" deep by 70" high as a floor easel; 21" wide by 24" deep by 36" high as a table easel. Display holder arms 2.2" in depth. Black anodized finish.
